updates.title: 8 tips for designers building branded templates in Figma Buzz
updates.description: To create self-serve templates that bend—but don’t break—brand designers need to consider work through a marketing lens. Here’s how to set up editing guardrails and design layouts that flex and scale.

updates.title: Introducing three new tools for precise image editing in Figma
updates.description: Today we’re introducing three new AI image editing tools that make precision editing faster, cleaner, and more intuitive—powering a more complete creative workflow in Figma.

updates.title: Creative Commons announces tentative support for AI ‘pay-to-crawl’ systems
updates.description: The organization offered support for this idea of an AI marketplace, and  suggested several guiding principles.

updates.title: Adobe Firefly now supports prompt-based video editing, adds more third-party models
updates.description: Adobe is updating its AI video-generation app, Firefly, with a new video editor that supports precise prompt-based edits, as well as adding new third-party models for image and video generation, including Black Forest Labs' FLUX.2 and Topaz Astra.

updates.title: Just our type: The story of creating Figma Sans
updates.description: As Figma expands to include tools for all product builders, our community has evolved—and so has our brand. We’ve overhauled our entire visual identity from color palette to illustration style, and even commissioned a new typeface.

updates.title: Nvidia bulks up open source offerings with an acquisition and new open AI models
updates.description: Nvidia acquired SchedMD, the lead developer of Slurm, and launched the Nemotron 3 family of open source AI models.

updates.title: Merriam-Webster names ‘slop’ the word of the year
updates.description: AI-generated content has dominated the internet over the past year, and America's dictionary took note.
